description: This component is based on the [Radix UI Dropdown Menu Content](https://www.radix-ui.com/primitives/docs/components/dropdown-menu#content) primitive.

sideOffset.description: The space in pixels between the dropdown menu and its trigger element.

collisionPadding.description: The distance in pixels from the boundary edges where collision detection should occur.

align.description:
The alignment of the dropdown menu relative to its trigger element.

@defaultValue center
